1.0.0.1: Email us at hello@afterparty.io to tell us how we did, and how we can do better!

1.0.1.0: Oops! iOS 7 phones no longer have problems running the app. Sorry about that one!

1.1.0.0: Oh yeah, bug fixes, and all that jazz.
1.1.0.1: Even better, every user who's at that event already will now get a push notification that the event has changed!
1.1.0.2: Also, we'll keep you posted when things happen with your event now. That's a little thing we like to call user engagement.
1.1.0.3: You asked, we listened. You can now edit events that you created while they're still in session!
